charges.charge_description: 18:1962(c), 1963 and 3551 et seq. Conspiracy to Distribute And to Possess Cocaine Base, A Schedule II Narcotic Drug Controlled Substance. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is Sentenced to Count 1 of The Indictment And Receives A Terms of 12 Years Imprisonment to be Followed by 5 Years Supervised Release And $100.00 Special Assessment Fee. Restitution in The Amount of $3,308.00. Amended: Defendant is Sentenced to Imprisonmetn of 142 Months to be Followed by 5 Years Supervised Release; $100.00 Special Assessment Fee; Restitution in The Amount of $3,308.00.
